headline: This Stock-Split Stock Could Crush the Market, According to Wall Street
summary: There have been more than 450 forward stock splits year to date, including reverse stock splits.  Additional stock splits are on the way in the next few weeks.  Lam Research (NASDAQ: LRCX) conducted a 10-for-1 stock split following the market close on Oct. 2, 2024.
